column5: Has anyone fished at Pavilion Richer? This outfitter is located north of Maniwaki Quebec on the Clova road
Never been there, but operation appears to be for sale: http://www.luxuryrealestate.com/resi...-quebec-canada

I have not been there since the early 2000's. I did fish there three years in a row. First year was great - lots of walleyes. The next two years we struggled. Remote cabin was a 6 on a 10 scale. I did see them at the Montreal Outfitters show this year. Too many other really good places to go in PQ. I wouldn't go back there.
I would be open to suggestions if you have some. There would be 4 in our party and would not mind getting well off the beaten path. Thanks
Another hour to the north will get you to The Gouin, plenty of camps up there to choose from.
You really can't go wrong with any of the outfitters on the Gouin. I have done many fly-in and drive-in trips up there.
